meanings.definition: To list or record as an item.
meanings.sent1: I itemed all the groceries on the shopping list.
meanings.sent2: She itemed the tasks for the day in her planner.
meanings.sent3: The teacher itemed the students' names on the attendance sheet.
meanings.sent4: The detective itemed the clues to solve the mystery.
meanings.sent5: He itemed every detail of the crime scene in his report.

meanings.sent1: The pencil sharpener is a small itemed in the stationery store.
meanings.sent2: She found a rare itemed at the antique shop.
meanings.sent3: The tiny itemed was lost among the larger items on the shelf.
meanings.sent4: The necklace was a precious itemed passed down through generations.
meanings.sent5: The keychain was a unique itemed she treasured.
